eligibility: Must provide a signed message from a Genesis B7C address (pre-2010)
Must be publicly verified via blockchain explorer (on-chain signature)
Must not involve third-party custody or exchange-controlled addresses
Proof must be cryptographically verifiable by OCOS DAO oracle

validationProcess.step1: Submit claim form to DAO proposal system
validationProcess.step2: Cryptographic message verification via OpenHash proof engine
validationProcess.step3: DAO community vote on unlocking procedure
validationProcess.step4: If approved, symbolic release protocol is triggered

disputeMechanism.finalDecision: Irreversible once DAO vote is executed

example.message: I hereby confirm that I control legacy B7C address 1A1zP1eP5QGefi2DMPTfTL5SLmv7DivfNa

legalDisclaimer: This proof document is symbolic and does not represent direct financial access to B7C. It represents a DAO-controlled reserve activation protocol subject to ethical governance and cryptographic legitimacy.
